#summary How to settup asgettext on your machine.

= Requirements =

For running asgettext you need the following programs installed on your machine:
  * [http://www.gnu.org/software/gettext/ gnu-gettext] for extracting the translation strings
  * [http://www.ruby-lang.org/ ruby] for running the script
